name: Documentation and Annotation Kit
description:
Documentation and annotation kit first release. This kit build with auto layout and variants. I really love and appreciate any request, recommendations, or critic. feel free comment.


Enjoy and feel free to share your comments here or DM on my Twitter @ridho_anandamal or you can buy me a coffee.


Any critic or advice on this file. Thank you and have a nice day!


Changelog:


Version 1.1 - 25 August 2021

  • Add My Other Collection: Complete Bootstrap 4.6 Kit, Eggradients Gradient Collection,.


Version 1.0 - 4 August 2021

  • Typography and Color: Typeface Lato, 6 color and 4 gray color.
  • Flow Kit: Include Flowchart, State
  • Annotation Kit: Sticky note, textbox note, text arrow pin, number indication, box process, border
  • Cover Kit: Cover, Cover Text, Date Tag, Status Tag, Type Tag, For Tag, User Tag, Cover Border.
